text: Walter Jones (born 4 April 1925) is a Northern Irish former professional footballer who played as a right half in the Football League for Doncaster Rovers and York City, in Northern Ireland for Linfield, and was on the books of Blackpool and Grimsby Town without making a league appearance. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lurgan Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:Association football wing halves Category:Linfield F.C. players Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Doncaster Rovers F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Walter Jones (Northern Irish footballer)
